widgets.Desc: Stay organized and productive! This to-do list allows you to add, check and delete tasks with ease. Keep track of what’s important and never miss a deadline again.
Solve all your math problems instantly! From basic arithmetic to more complex calculations, this easy-to-use calculator is perfect for quick computations.
Discover the world of cinema! This widget fetches trending movies from a free API, showcasing movie titles and posters to keep film enthusiasts updated with the latest hits.

games.Desc: Put your strategy skills to the test! Play this classic two-player game against a friend or practice solo and become the ultimate Tic Tac Toe champion.
Slide tiles and combine numbers to reach the magical 2048! This highly addictive puzzle game challenges your logic and planning skills with every move.
Take a nostalgic trip back to the arcade days! Guide the snake to collect food and grow longer while avoiding collisions in this retro classic.
Test your reflexes in this fast-paced game! Help the bird navigate through obstacles without hitting them. How far can you go before it’s game over?
